title: Stormy Rain In The City Sound Effect Pack
description: This collection contains the ambient sounds of a stormy night. The sounds of rain in different intensity from both indoors and outdoors. Thunder, lightning, raindrops and the sound of drains in different variations.
longDescription:
This collection contains the ambient sounds of a stormy night. The sounds of rain in different intensity from both indoors and outdoors.

Thunder, lightning, raindrops and the sound of drains in different variations.


I always try to take advantage of the stormy and rainy weather for sound recording. That’s how this collection of sounds was born. It’s a collection of sounds related to rainy weather.


This sound effect collection is ideal for use in game software, applications, commercials, movies, TV shows,

videos, animation, and any other entertainment industry where a high-quality audio effect is essential.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 40 Rain and Storm sound effect.
  • Excellent for storm and rain scenes on productions. 

Number of Audio Waves: 40

Number of Audio Cues: 40

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit / Stereo

Do Sound FX loop: One shot and Loop sounds

Minutes of audio provided: 1hr 22min 42sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation and Audio Demo : https://soundcloud.com/deb-sound-com/stormy-rain-in-the-city-sound-pack-01-demo
